articles.title: Mcap of five of top-10 most valued firms erode by Rs 1.67 lakh crore; HDFC Bank biggest laggard - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Last week, five of the top 10 valued firms witnessed a combined erosion of Rs 1,67,936.21 crore, with HDFC Bank facing significant losses.
articles.content:
The combined market valuation of five of the top 10 valued firms eroded by Rs 1,67,936.21 crore last week, with HDFC Bank emerging as the biggest laggard.
